participant_1.background:
I spend my spare time doing solitary activities like reading and hiking.
I had to move across country for my job.
i am a petsitter.
I love my job as an accountant, but I can't stand heights.
I call my family to catch up and hear about their days.

participant_2.background:
I and my mom like to listen to the Beatles together.
I had to learn how to balance my time between my two jobs while also taking care of my family.
I would like to have lunch with a doctor who can help me recover from my knee surgery.
I want to take my uniform off and relax.
I'm a person who can enjoy the simple things in life and also be prepared for whatever comes my way.

content.text: Hi there! How are you?
Hey, I'm doing well! How about yourself?
I'm doing okay. What are some of your interests?
I enjoy listening to music, spending time with my family, and taking care of my animals. What about you?
I like reading, hiking, and spending time with my family and friends. I'm also an accountant and petsitter!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been hiking before, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's really enjoyable! I especially love hiking in the mountains.
I can imagine! I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I'm sure I would enjoy it.
If you ever want to go hiking, let me know! I'd be happy to show you around the trails.
Thanks for the offer! I'll keep that in mind.
No problem!
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all sorts of music, but my favorites are rock, pop, and country.
I like those genres too! I'm a big Beatles fan.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
I love their music. It's so timeless.
I agree. It's always been good.
I'm glad we have similar taste in music!
Me too!
It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
Exactly!
